definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: voluntariness, freewill-offering;—abs. ´[[נ]] Ex 35:29 + 14 t.; cstr. [[נִדְבַת]] De 16:10; pl. [[נְדָבוֹת]] Am 4:5, Ps 68:10; [[נְדָבׂת]] Ps 110:3; cstr. [[נִדְבוֹת]] Ps 119:108, 2Ch 31:14; sf. [[נִדְבׂתֶ֫יְ]] De 12:7 + 4 t. sfs.;—

voluntariness [[אׂהֲבֵם נְדָבָה]] Ho 14:5 I (´[[י]]) will love them freely; [[עַמְּ ְנְדָבׂת בְּיוֹם]] [[חֵילְֶָ]] Ps 110:3 thy people will be (all) voluntariness in the day of thy host (be ready to volunteer, v. Br:MP 133); [[גֶּשֶׁם נדבות]] Ps 68:10 generous (copious) rain; [[בנדבה]] Ps 54:7 voluntarily, and adverb. acc. [[נדבה]] De 23:24 (v. Dr.).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: incl. gifts used in erection and furnishing of tabernacle Ex 35:29, Ex 36:3 (P); for first temple 2Ch 31:14, second Ezr 1:6, Ezr 8:28.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: incl. [[עולה]] and [[שׁלמים]] Ez 46:42; prob. also Am 4:5, [[נדבות פִי]] Ps 119:108.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: usu. a [[זֶבַח]] for festival meals at Passover 2Ch 35:8, Pentecost De 16:10, Tabernacles Ezr 3:5 (besides the ritual offerings); disting. from [[נֶדֶר]] votive offering Le 7:16, Nu 15:3, Nu 29:39 (P), Le 22:18, Le 22:21, Le 22:23, Le 23:38 (H), De 12:6, De 12:17.—(Verbs used are ´[[הביא נ]] Ex 35:29, Ex 36:3; ´[[הקריב נ]]Le 22:18; ´[[עשׂה נ]] Nu 15:3, Ez Eze 46:12; ´[[נתן נ]] Le 23:38, De 16:10.)
